item.title: Andrea add a quote by Oprah Winfrey
item.description: "Turn your wounds into wisdom." -- Oprah Winfrey

item.title: Andrea add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "I did then what I knew how to do. Now that I know better, I do better." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Andrea add a quote by Oprah Winfrey
item.description: "The biggest adventure you can ever take is to live the life of your dreams." -- Oprah Winfrey

item.title: Andrea add a quote by Oprah Winfrey
item.description: "The more you praise and celebrate your life, the more there is in life to celebrate." -- Oprah Winfrey

item.title: Andrea add a quote by Oprah Winfrey
item.description: "You get to know who you really are in a crisis." -- Oprah Winfrey

item.title: Andrea add a quote by Oprah Winfrey
item.description: "Real integrity is doing the right thing, knowing that nobodyâ€™s going to know whether you did it or not." -- Oprah Winfrey

item.title: Andrea add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "Folks are usually about as happy as they make their minds up to be." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Andrea add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "When I do good, I feel good. When I do bad, I feel bad. That's my religion." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Andrea add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "America will never be destroyed from the outside. If we falter and lose our freedoms, it will be because we destroyed ourselves." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Andrea add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "Nearly all men can stand adversity, but if you want to test a man's character, give him power." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Andrea add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "My father taught me to work, but not to love it. I never did like to work, and I don't deny it. I'd rather read, tell stories, crack jokes, talk, laugh -- anything but work." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Andrea add a quote by Michael Moore
item.description: "We live in the time where we have fictitious election results that elects a fictitious president. We live in a time where we have a man sending us to war for fictitious reasons. " -- Michael Moore

item.title: Andrea add a quote by Hillary Rodham Clinton
item.description: "Every child needs a champion." -- Hillary Rodham Clinton

item.title: Andrea add a quote by Hillary Rodham Clinton
item.description: "It took a Clinton to clean up after the first Bush, it may take another Clinton to clean up after the second one" -- Hillary Rodham Clinton

item.title: Andrea add a quote by Barack Obama
item.description: "Change will not come if we wait for some other person, or if we wait for some other time. We are the ones we've been waiting for. We are the change that we seek." -- Barack Obama

item.title: Andrea add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description:
"I can be changed by what happens to me. But I refuse to be reduced by it.
(Popular misquote of "You may not control all the events that happen to you, but you can decide not to be reduced by them.")" -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Andrea add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "Music was my refuge. I could crawl into the space between the notes and curl my back to loneliness." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Andrea add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "Life is pure adventure, and the sooner we realize that, the quicker we will be able to treat life as art." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Andrea add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "My mission in life is not merely to survive, but to thrive; and to do so with some passion, some compassion, some humor, and some style" -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Andrea add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "When someone shows you who they are believe them; the first time." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Andrea add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside you." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Andrea add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "There's a world of difference between truth and facts. Facts can obscure truth." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Andrea add a quote by Bill Maher
item.description:
"There's an old, frequently-used definition of insanity, which is "performing the same action over and over, expecting different results."... Now, I'm no doctor, but I am on TV. And in my professional opinion, George Bush is a paranoid schizophrenic. ...
...Other symptoms of paranoid schizophrenia are: Do you see things that aren't there? Such as a link between 9/11 and Iraq? Do you - do you feel things that you shouldn't be feeling, like a sense of accomplishment? Do you have trouble organizing words into a coherent sentence? Do you hear voices that aren't really there? Like, oh, I don't know, your imaginary friend, Jesus? Telling you to start a war in the Middle East.
Well, guess what? There are a large number of people out there also suffering from the same delusions, because there are Republicans, there are conservatives, and then there are the Bushies. This is the 29 percent of Americans who still think he's doing "a heck of a job, Whitey." And I don't believe that it's coincidence that almost the same number of Americans - 25 percent - told a recent pollster that they believe that this year - this year, 2007 - would bring the Second Coming of Christ!
I have a hunch these are the same people. Because, if you think that you're going to meet Jesus before they cancel "Ugly Betty," then you're used to doing things by faith. And if you have so much blind faith that you think this war is winnable, you're nuts and you shouldn't be allowed near a voting booth." -- Bill Maher

item.title: Andrea add a quote by Bill Clinton
item.description: "There is nothing wrong with America that cannot be cured by what is right with America." -- Bill Clinton

item.title: Andrea add a quote by Bill Cosby
item.description: "I don't know the key to success, but the key to failure is trying to please everyone." -- Bill Cosby

item.title: Andrea add a quote by Bill Cosby
item.description: "Having a child is surely the most beautifully irrational act that two people in love can commit." -- Bill Cosby

item.title: Andrea add a quote by Bill Cosby
item.description: "Women don't want to hear what you think. Women want to hear what they think - in a deeper voice." -- Bill Cosby

item.title: Andrea add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Our lives begin to end the day we become silent about things that matter." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Andrea add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Everybody can be great...because anybody can serve. You don't have to have a college degree to serve. You don't have to make your subject and verb agree to serve. You only need a heart full of grace. A soul generated by love." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Andrea add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Injustice anywhere is a threat to justice everywhere." -- Martin Luther King Jr.
